song_name: I Believe In A Thing Called Love
metrics_conclusion: I Believe In A Thing Called Love has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: I Believe In A Thing Called Love has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Dorian,  and F Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
